summary: Three young men become terrorized in a high-speed car chase with a mysterious pursuant.
cast: Randy Quaid|Shane Johnson|Josh Hammond|Jason Dohring|Kiersten Warren|Adam Vernier|Taylor Stanley|Kelly Mullis|Robert Clunis|Marilyn Silva|Karl Johnson|Richard Deutsch|Christopher Gilbertson|Shannon Holzer|Jeremy Fry|Allison Hite
title: Black Cadillac
